ALNApplication.summary: Primary runtime container for route registration, middleware/plugins, service adapters, lifecycle hooks, and OpenAPI metadata.

ALNConfig.summary: Configuration loader that merges base + environment plist files into the runtime config dictionary.

ALNMiddleware.summary: Middleware protocol for pre-dispatch and optional post-dispatch request processing.

ALNLifecycleHook.summary: Lifecycle callback protocol invoked around app startup and shutdown boundaries.

ALNPlugin.summary: Plugin protocol for declarative app extension (registration + optional middleware contribution).

ALNTraceExporter.summary: Trace-export protocol used to publish structured request spans to external observability sinks.

ALNHTTPServer.summary: HTTP server host that binds an `ALNApplication` to socket runtime and request loop execution.

ALNRequest.summary: Immutable HTTP request model containing method/path/query/headers/body and parsed parameter helpers.

ALNResponse.summary: Mutable HTTP response model for status, headers, and body serialization into wire-format bytes.

ALNContext.summary: Per-request execution context shared across middleware and controllers, including params/auth/session/services.

ALNController.summary: Base controller with template/JSON rendering, parameter helpers, auth/session helpers, and envelope conventions.

ALNPageState.summary: Page-state helper for namespaced key/value persistence across requests in compatibility workflows.

ALNRouter.summary: Route registry and matcher with support for route grouping, guard actions, and format constraints.

ALNRoute.summary: Single route descriptor containing method/path pattern/controller/action and matching helpers.

ALNRouteMatch.summary: Route match result object containing matched route metadata and extracted route params.

ALNEOCTranspiler.summary: EOC template compiler/transpiler with lint diagnostics and deterministic symbol/path resolution.

ALNView.summary: Template renderer that executes transpiled EOC templates with optional strict locals/stringify behavior.

ALNCSRFMiddleware.summary: CSRF validation middleware for state-changing requests using token headers/query params.

ALNRateLimitMiddleware.summary: In-memory rate limiting middleware for per-window request throttling.

ALNResponseEnvelopeMiddleware.summary: Middleware that normalizes JSON API responses into a consistent envelope shape.

ALNSecurityHeadersMiddleware.summary: Middleware that injects security-related response headers (including optional CSP).

ALNSessionMiddleware.summary: Session middleware that signs/verifies cookie-backed session state for request context access.

ALNDatabaseConnection.summary: Database-connection protocol defining query/command primitives used by adapters and routers.

ALNDatabaseAdapter.summary: Database-adapter protocol defining connection lifecycle, query primitives, transactions, and capability metadata.

ALNDatabaseRouter.summary: Read/write routing layer that selects database targets by operation class and routing context.

ALNDisplayGroup.summary: DisplayGroup-style query helper that builds list fetches from filter and sort descriptors.

ALNGDL2Adapter.summary: Optional GDL2 compatibility adapter with fallback behavior when native GDL2 runtime is unavailable.

ALNMigrationRunner.summary: Migration discovery and migration execution runner for SQL migration directories.

ALNPgConnection.summary: PostgreSQL connection wrapper with SQL execution, prepared statements, transactions, and builder execution helpers.

ALNPg.summary: PostgreSQL adapter with pooled connections and adapter-compatible query/command/transaction APIs.

ALNSQLBuilder.summary: Fluent SQL builder for `SELECT`/`INSERT`/`UPDATE`/`DELETE` with expression-safe composition and deterministic SQL output.

ALNPostgresSQLBuilder.summary: PostgreSQL dialect extension for `ALNSQLBuilder` covering `ON CONFLICT` upsert behaviors.

ALNSchemaCodegen.summary: Schema artifact generator for typed table/column contracts and optional typed decode helpers.

ALNAuth.summary: Authentication and authorization helpers for bearer token extraction, JWT verification, and scope/role checks.

ALNLogger.summary: Structured logger with configurable output format and level-specific convenience methods.

ALNMetricsRegistry.summary: In-memory metrics registry for counters, gauges, timings, snapshots, and Prometheus text output.

ALNPerfTrace.summary: Per-request performance stage recorder used for internal timing diagnostics and perf event export.

ALNRealtimeSubscriber.summary: Realtime callback protocol implemented by websocket/session subscribers.

ALNRealtimeSubscription.summary: Subscription token returned by realtime hub subscribe calls and used for unsubscribe operations.

ALNRealtimeHub.summary: In-process pub/sub hub used for websocket channel fanout and simple realtime event routing.

ALNJobAdapter.summary: Job adapter protocol for enqueue/dequeue/ack/retry operations and queue state diagnostics.

ALNJobEnvelope.summary: Immutable leased-job envelope containing identity, payload, attempt counters, and schedule metadata.

ALNJobWorkerRuntime.summary: Worker runtime callback protocol that decides ack/retry/discard disposition for leased jobs.

ALNJobWorker.summary: Worker orchestration helper that leases due jobs and executes them through a runtime callback.

ALNJobWorkerRunSummary.summary: Summary payload for one worker run, including lease/ack/retry/error counters.

ALNCacheAdapter.summary: Cache adapter protocol for set/get/remove/clear operations with optional TTL semantics.

ALNLocalizationAdapter.summary: Localization adapter protocol for translation registration, lookup, and locale discovery.

ALNMailAdapter.summary: Mail adapter protocol for outbound delivery and delivery snapshot diagnostics.

ALNAttachmentAdapter.summary: Attachment adapter protocol for save/read/delete/list operations on binary blobs + metadata.

ALNRedisCacheAdapter.summary: Redis-backed cache adapter implementation compatible with `ALNCacheAdapter` semantics.

ALNFileJobAdapter.summary: Filesystem-backed job queue adapter for durable local/edge deployments.

ALNFileMailAdapter.summary: Filesystem-backed mail adapter that writes deliveries to disk for auditing/testing.

ALNFileSystemAttachmentAdapter.summary: Filesystem-backed attachment adapter for durable binary storage.

ALNApplication|router.purpose: Router instance that owns route registration and path matching for this app.

ALNApplication|config.purpose: Resolved application configuration dictionary used at runtime.

ALNApplication|logger.purpose: Application-wide structured logger used by controllers/middleware/runtime internals.

ALNApplication|metrics.purpose: Application-wide metrics registry used for counters/gauges/timings and `/metrics` export.

ALNApplication|middlewares.purpose: Ordered middleware list executed for request pre/post processing.

ALNApplication|plugins.purpose: Registered plugin instances that extended this app during bootstrap.

ALNApplication|lifecycleHooks.purpose: Registered lifecycle hooks invoked around startup and shutdown.

ALNApplication|staticMounts.purpose: Configured static mount definitions used by the HTTP server static-file path.

ALNApplication|clusterName.purpose: Cluster identifier used for distributed-runtime diagnostics and headers.

ALNApplication|clusterNodeID.purpose: Node identifier used for distributed-runtime diagnostics and headers.
